data.title: Xiaomi hires engineer from Tesla’s Optimus team to lead robotic hand development
data.description: Zach Lu Zeyu joins Xiaomi as lead of its dexterous hand research and development operations.
data.keywords: Optimus, LinkedIn, embodied artificial intelligence, smartphones, autonomous driving, Xiaomi, Johns Hopkins University, MiMo, Zach Lu Zeyu, China, Tesla, robotics, Li Chao, Tsinghua University, DeepSeek, Hangzhou, Chinese, US, National University of Singapore, Deep Robotics, humanoid robot, Beijing, electric vehicles, Luo Fuli
